But your brothers, all the house of Israel, may weep because of the burning that Yahweh caused,

content: 7 but you must not go out from the entrance to the tent of assembly lest you die, because Yahweh’s anointing oil is on you.” So they did according to Moses’ word.
content_old: 7 but you must not go out from the entrance to the tent of assembly lest you die, because Yahweh’s anointing oil is on you.” So they did according to Moses’ word.

content: 8 Then Yahweh spoke to Aaron, saying,
content_old: 8 Then Yahweh spoke to Aaron, saying,

content: 9 “You and your sons with you may not drink wine or strong drink when you come to the tent of assembly, so that you will not die—it is a lasting statute for your generations—
content_old: 9 “You and your sons with you may not drink wine or strong drink when you come to the tent of assembly, so that you will not die—it is a lasting statute for your generations—

content: 10 and to distinguish between the holy and the unholy, as well as between the unclean and the clean,
content_old: 10 and to distinguish between the holy and the unholy, as well as between the unclean and the clean,

content: 11 and to teach the Israelites all the rules that Yahweh has spoken to them through Moses.”
content_old: 11 and to teach the Israelites all the rules that Yahweh has spoken to them through Moses.”

content: 12 Then Moses spoke to Aaron and to his sons Eleazar and Ithamar, “As for the remaining parts, take the remainder of the grain offering from Yahweh’s offerings made by fire and eat it, the unleavened bread, beside the altar, because it is a most holy thing.
content_old: 12 Then Moses spoke to Aaron and to his sons Eleazar and Ithamar, “As for the remaining parts, take the remainder of the grain offering from Yahweh’s offerings made by fire and eat it, the unleavened bread, beside the altar, because it is a most holy thing.

content: 13 And you shall eat it in a holy place, because it is your allotted portion and the allotted portion of your sons from Yahweh’s offerings made by fire, for so I have been commanded.
content_old: 13 And you shall eat it in a holy place, because it is your allotted portion and the allotted portion of your sons from Yahweh’s offerings made by fire, for so I have been commanded.

content: 14 And the wave offering’s breast section and the upper thigh of the contribution offering you must eat in a clean place, you and your sons and your daughters with you, because they are given as your allotted portion and your sons’ allotted portion from the sacrifices of the Israelites’ fellowship offerings.
content_old: 14 And the wave offering’s breast section and the upper thigh of the contribution offering you must eat in a clean place, you and your sons and your daughters with you, because they are given as your allotted portion and your sons’ allotted portion from the sacrifices of the Israelites’ fellowship offerings.

content: 15 They must bring the thigh of the contribution offering and the breast section of the wave offering in addition to the offerings made by fire, consisting of the fat portions, to wave as a wave offering before Yahweh; and it will be for you and for your sons with you as a lasting rule, just as Yahweh had commanded.”
content_old: 15 They must bring the thigh of the contribution offering and the breast section of the wave offering in addition to the offerings made by fire, consisting of the fat portions, to wave as a wave offering before Yahweh; and it will be for you and for your sons with you as a lasting rule, just as Yahweh had commanded.”

content: 16 Then Moses sought all over for the goat of the sin offering and behold, it was burned up. So he was angry with Aaron’s remaining sons Eleazar and Ithamar, saying,
content_old: 16 Then Moses sought all over for the goat of the sin offering and behold, it was burned up. So he was angry with Aaron’s remaining sons Eleazar and Ithamar, saying,

content: 17 “Why did you not eat the sin offering on the sanctuary’s site, because it is a most holy thing? And he gave it to you to remove the community’s guilt, to make atonement for them before Yahweh.
content_old: 17 “Why did you not eat the sin offering on the sanctuary’s site, because it is a most holy thing? And he gave it to you to remove the community’s guilt, to make atonement for them before Yahweh.

content: 18 Look, its blood was not brought inside the sanctuary. Certainly you should have eaten it in the sanctuary, as I commanded.”
content_old: 18 Look, its blood was not brought inside the sanctuary. Certainly you should have eaten it in the sanctuary, as I commanded.”

content: 19 So Aaron said to Moses, “Look, today they presented their sin offering and their burnt offering before Yahweh, and things such as these have happened to me, and if I were to eat a sin offering today, would it have been good in Yahweh’s eyes?”
content_old: 19 So Aaron said to Moses, “Look, today they presented their sin offering and their burnt offering before Yahweh, and things such as these have happened to me, and if I were to eat a sin offering today, would it have been good in Yahweh’s eyes?”

content: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying to them,
content_old: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying to them,

content: 2 “Speak to the Israelites, saying, ‘These are the animals that you may eat from all the animals that are on the land:
content_old: 2 “Speak to the Israelites, saying, ‘These are the animals that you may eat from all the animals that are on the land:

content: 3 Any among the animals that has a divided hoof and has a split cleft in the hoof and that chews cud, such you may eat.
content_old: 3 Any among the animals that has a divided hoof and has a split cleft in the hoof and that chews cud, such you may eat.

content: 4 However, these you may not eat from those that chew the cud and from those that have a divided hoof: the camel, because it is a chewer of cud but it does not have a hoof that is divided—it is unclean for you;
content_old: 4 However, these you may not eat from those that chew the cud and from those that have a divided hoof: the camel, because it is a chewer of cud but it does not have a hoof that is divided—it is unclean for you;

content: 5 and the coney, because it is a chewer of cud but it does not have a hoof that is divided—it is unclean for you;
content_old: 5 and the coney, because it is a chewer of cud but it does not have a hoof that is divided—it is unclean for you;

content: 6 and the hare, because it is a chewer of cud but it does not have a hoof that is divided—it is unclean for you;
content_old: 6 and the hare, because it is a chewer of cud but it does not have a hoof that is divided—it is unclean for you;

content: 7 and the pig, because it has a divided hoof and has a split cleft in the hoof but it does not chew cud—it is unclean for you.
content_old: 7 and the pig, because it has a divided hoof and has a split cleft in the hoof but it does not chew cud—it is unclean for you.

content: 8 You must not eat from their meat, and you must not touch their dead body—they are unclean for you.
content_old: 8 You must not eat from their meat, and you must not touch their dead body—they are unclean for you.

content: 9 “ ‘These you may eat from all that are in the water: any in the water that has a fin and scales, whether in the seas or in the streams—such you may eat.
content_old: 9 “ ‘These you may eat from all that are in the water: any in the water that has a fin and scales, whether in the seas or in the streams—such you may eat.

content: 10 But any that does not have a fin and scales, whether in the seas or in the streams, among all the water’s swarmers among all the living creatures that are in the water—they are a detestable thing to you.
content_old: 10 But any that does not have a fin and scales, whether in the seas or in the streams, among all the water’s swarmers among all the living creatures that are in the water—they are a detestable thing to you.

content: 11 And they shall be detestable to you; you must not eat from their meat, and you must detest their dead body.
content_old: 11 And they shall be detestable to you; you must not eat from their meat, and you must detest their dead body.

content: 12 Any that does not have a fin and scales in the water—it is a detestable thing to you.
content_old: 12 Any that does not have a fin and scales in the water—it is a detestable thing to you.

content: 13 “ ‘And these you must detest from the birds; they must not be eaten—they are detestable: the eagle and the vulture and the short-toed eagle,
content_old: 13 “ ‘And these you must detest from the birds; they must not be eaten—they are detestable: the eagle and the vulture and the short-toed eagle,

content: 14 and the red kite and the black kite according to its kind,
content_old: 14 and the red kite and the black kite according to its kind,

content: 15 every crow according to its kind,
content_old: 15 every crow according to its kind,

content: 16 and the ostrich and the short-eared owl and the seagull and the hawk according to its kind,
content_old: 16 and the ostrich and the short-eared owl and the seagull and the hawk according to its kind,

content: 17 and the little owl and the cormorant and the great owl,
content_old: 17 and the little owl and the cormorant and the great owl,

content: 18 and the barn owl and the desert owl and the carrion vulture,
content_old: 18 and the barn owl and the desert owl and the carrion vulture,

content: 19 and the stork, the heron according to its kind and the hoopoe and the bat.
content_old: 19 and the stork, the heron according to its kind and the hoopoe and the bat.

content: 20 “ ‘Any winged insect that walks on all fours is detestable to you.
content_old: 20 “ ‘Any winged insect that walks on all fours is detestable to you.

content: 21 Only this may you eat from any of the winged insects that walk on all fours—that which has jointed legs above its feet for leaping upon the land.
content_old: 21 Only this may you eat from any of the winged insects that walk on all fours—that which has jointed legs above its feet for leaping upon the land.

content: 22 From these you may eat the locust according to its kind and the bald locust according to its kind and the cricket according to its kind and the grasshopper according to its kind.
content_old: 22 From these you may eat the locust according to its kind and the bald locust according to its kind and the cricket according to its kind and the grasshopper according to its kind.

content: 23 But any other winged insect that has four legs is detestable to you.
content_old: 23 But any other winged insect that has four legs is detestable to you.

content: 24 And by these you shall become unclean—anyone who touches their dead body shall become unclean until the evening,
content_old: 24 And by these you shall become unclean—anyone who touches their dead body shall become unclean until the evening,

content: 25 and anyone who carries their dead body must wash his garments, and he shall be unclean until the evening.
content_old: 25 and anyone who carries their dead body must wash his garments, and he shall be unclean until the evening.

content: 26 “ ‘With regard to any animal that has a divided hoof but does not split the hoof, or does not have a cud for chewing—they are unclean for you; anyone who touches them shall become unclean.
content_old: 26 “ ‘With regard to any animal that has a divided hoof but does not split the hoof, or does not have a cud for chewing—they are unclean for you; anyone who touches them shall become unclean.

content: 27 And anything that walks upon its paws among any of the animals that walks on all fours—they are unclean for you; anyone who touches their dead body shall become unclean until the evening,
content_old: 27 And anything that walks upon its paws among any of the animals that walks on all fours—they are unclean for you; anyone who touches their dead body shall become unclean until the evening,

content: 28 and the one who carries their dead body must wash his garments, and he shall be unclean until the evening—they are unclean for you.
content_old: 28 and the one who carries their dead body must wash his garments, and he shall be unclean until the evening—they are unclean for you.

content: 29 “ ‘And these are the unclean for you among the swarmers that swarm on the land: the weasel and the mouse and the thorn-tailed lizard according to its kind,
content_old: 29 “ ‘And these are the unclean for you among the swarmers that swarm on the land: the weasel and the mouse and the thorn-tailed lizard according to its kind,

content: 30 and the gecko and the land crocodile and the lizard and the sand lizard and the chameleon.
content_old: 30 and the gecko and the land crocodile and the lizard and the sand lizard and the chameleon.

content: 31 These are the unclean for you among all the swarmers; anyone who touches them at their death shall become unclean until the evening.
content_old: 31 These are the unclean for you among all the swarmers; anyone who touches them at their death shall become unclean until the evening.

content: 32 And anything on which one of them falls at their death shall become unclean: any object of wood or garment or skin or sackcloth—any object that has performed work—must be placed in water, and it shall be unclean until the evening, and then it shall be clean.
content_old: 32 And anything on which one of them falls at their death shall become unclean: any object of wood or garment or skin or sackcloth—any object that has performed work—must be placed in water, and it shall be unclean until the evening, and then it shall be clean.

content: 33 And any clay vessel into which one of them falls, all that is in it shall become unclean, and you must break it.
content_old: 33 And any clay vessel into which one of them falls, all that is in it shall become unclean, and you must break it.

content: 34 Any of the food that could be eaten on which water from such a vessel comes shall become unclean, and any liquid that could be drunk in any such vessel shall become unclean.
content_old: 34 Any of the food that could be eaten on which water from such a vessel comes shall become unclean, and any liquid that could be drunk in any such vessel shall become unclean.

content: 35 And anything on which one of their dead bodies falls shall become unclean: an oven or a stove must be broken—they are unclean and shall be unclean for you.
content_old: 35 And anything on which one of their dead bodies falls shall become unclean: an oven or a stove must be broken—they are unclean and shall be unclean for you.

content: 36 Surely a spring or a cistern collecting water shall be clean, but that which touches their dead body shall become unclean.
content_old: 36 Surely a spring or a cistern collecting water shall be clean, but that which touches their dead body shall become unclean.

content: 37 And when one of their dead bodies falls on any seed for sowing, it is clean.
content_old: 37 And when one of their dead bodies falls on any seed for sowing, it is clean.

content: 38 But when water is put on the seed and one of their dead bodies falls on it, it is unclean for you.
content_old: 38 But when water is put on the seed and one of their dead bodies falls on it, it is unclean for you.

content: 39 “ ‘And when one of the animals dies that is for you to eat, the one who touches its dead body shall become unclean until the evening.
content_old: 39 “ ‘And when one of the animals dies that is for you to eat, the one who touches its dead body shall become unclean until the evening.

content: 40 And the one who eats some of its dead body must wash his garments, and he shall be unclean until the evening; and the one who carries its dead body must wash his garments, and he shall be unclean until the evening.
content_old: 40 And the one who eats some of its dead body must wash his garments, and he shall be unclean until the evening; and the one who carries its dead body must wash his garments, and he shall be unclean until the evening.

content: 41 “ ‘And any swarmer that swarms on the land is detestable; it must not be eaten.
content_old: 41 “ ‘And any swarmer that swarms on the land is detestable; it must not be eaten.

content: 42 You must not eat anything that moves upon its belly or that walks on all fours, even any with numerous feet belonging to any swarmer that swarms on the land, because they are detestable.
content_old: 42 You must not eat anything that moves upon its belly or that walks on all fours, even any with numerous feet belonging to any swarmer that swarms on the land, because they are detestable.

content: 43 You must not defile yourselves with any swarmer that swarms, and you must not make yourselves unclean by them and so be made unclean by them,
content_old: 43 You must not defile yourselves with any swarmer that swarms, and you must not make yourselves unclean by them and so be made unclean by them,

content: 44 because I am Yahweh your God, and you must keep yourselves sanctified, so that you shall be holy, because I am holy. And you must not make yourselves unclean with any swarmer that moves along on the land,
content_old: 44 because I am Yahweh your God, and you must keep yourselves sanctified, so that you shall be holy, because I am holy. And you must not make yourselves unclean with any swarmer that moves along on the land,

content: 45 because I am Yahweh, who brought you up from the land of Egypt to be for you as God. Thus you shall be holy, because I am holy.
content_old: 45 because I am Yahweh, who brought you up from the land of Egypt to be for you as God. Thus you shall be holy, because I am holy.

content: 46 “ ‘This is the regulation of the animals and the birds and all living creatures that move along in the water and concerning all the creatures that swarm on the land,
content_old: 46 “ ‘This is the regulation of the animals and the birds and all living creatures that move along in the water and concerning all the creatures that swarm on the land,

content: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,
content_old: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

content: 2 “Speak to the Israelites, saying, ‘When a woman becomes pregnant and she gives birth to a male, then she shall be unclean seven days—as in the time of her menstrual bleeding, she shall become unclean.
content_old: 2 “Speak to the Israelites, saying, ‘When a woman becomes pregnant and she gives birth to a male, then she shall be unclean seven days—as in the time of her menstrual bleeding, she shall become unclean.

content: 3 And on the eighth day his foreskin’s flesh shall be circumcised.
content_old: 3 And on the eighth day his foreskin’s flesh shall be circumcised.

content: 4 And for thirty-three days she shall stay in the blood of her cleansing; she must not touch any holy object, and she may not come to the sanctuary until the fulfilling of the days of her cleansing.
content_old: 4 And for thirty-three days she shall stay in the blood of her cleansing; she must not touch any holy object, and she may not come to the sanctuary until the fulfilling of the days of her cleansing.

content: 5 But if she gives birth to a female, then she shall be unclean for two weeks as in her menstruation, and for sixty-six days she shall stay through the blood of her cleansing.
content_old: 5 But if she gives birth to a female, then she shall be unclean for two weeks as in her menstruation, and for sixty-six days she shall stay through the blood of her cleansing.

content: 6 And at the fulfilling of the days of her cleansing, whether for a son or for a daughter, she must bring to the priest at the tent of assembly’s entrance a yearling male lamb as a burnt offering and young dove or a turtledove as a sin offering.
content_old: 6 And at the fulfilling of the days of her cleansing, whether for a son or for a daughter, she must bring to the priest at the tent of assembly’s entrance a yearling male lamb as a burnt offering and young dove or a turtledove as a sin offering.

content: 7 And the priest shall present it before Yahweh, and he shall make atonement for her, so that she shall be clean from the flow of her blood. This is the regulation of childbearing for the male or for the female.

content: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying,
content_old: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying,

content: 2 “When a person has on his body’s skin a swelling or an epidermal eruption or a spot and it becomes an infectious skin disease on his body’s skin, then he shall be brought to Aaron the priest or to one of his sons the priests.
content_old: 2 “When a person has on his body’s skin a swelling or an epidermal eruption or a spot and it becomes an infectious skin disease on his body’s skin, then he shall be brought to Aaron the priest or to one of his sons the priests.

content: 3 And the priest shall examine the infection on his body’s skin, and if the hair in the infection turns white and the appearance of the infection is deeper than his body’s skin, it is an infectious skin disease, and the priest shall examine it, and he shall declare him unclean.
content_old: 3 And the priest shall examine the infection on his body’s skin, and if the hair in the infection turns white and the appearance of the infection is deeper than his body’s skin, it is an infectious skin disease, and the priest shall examine it, and he shall declare him unclean.

content: 4 But if a spot is white on his body’s skin and its appearance is not deeper than the skin and its hair does not turn white, then the priest shall confine the afflicted person for seven days.
content_old: 4 But if a spot is white on his body’s skin and its appearance is not deeper than the skin and its hair does not turn white, then the priest shall confine the afflicted person for seven days.

content: 5 And the priest shall examine it on the seventh day, and if, in his eyes, the infection has stayed unchanged, the infection has not spread on the skin, then the priest shall confine him for seven days a second time.
content_old: 5 And the priest shall examine it on the seventh day, and if, in his eyes, the infection has stayed unchanged, the infection has not spread on the skin, then the priest shall confine him for seven days a second time.

content: 6 And the priest shall examine him on the seventh day for a second time, and if the infection has faded and the infection has not spread on the skin, then the priest shall declare him clean—it is an epidermal eruption; and he shall wash his garments, and so he shall be clean.
content_old: 6 And the priest shall examine him on the seventh day for a second time, and if the infection has faded and the infection has not spread on the skin, then the priest shall declare him clean—it is an epidermal eruption; and he shall wash his garments, and so he shall be clean.

content: 7 But if the epidermal eruption spreads further on the skin after showing himself to the priest for his cleansing, then he shall appear a second time to the priest.
content_old: 7 But if the epidermal eruption spreads further on the skin after showing himself to the priest for his cleansing, then he shall appear a second time to the priest.

content: 8 And the priest shall examine it, and if the epidermal eruption has spread on the skin, then the priest shall declare him unclean—it is an infectious skin disease.
content_old: 8 And the priest shall examine it, and if the epidermal eruption has spread on the skin, then the priest shall declare him unclean—it is an infectious skin disease.

content: 9 “When an infectious skin disease is on a person and he is brought to the priest,

content: 10 the priest shall examine it, and if a white swelling is on the skin and it turns the hair white and raw flesh is in the swelling,
content_old: 10 the priest shall examine it, and if a white swelling is on the skin and it turns the hair white and raw flesh is in the swelling,

content: 11 it is a chronic infectious skin disease on his body’s skin, and the priest shall declare him unclean; he shall not confine him, because he is unclean.
content_old: 11 it is a chronic infectious skin disease on his body’s skin, and the priest shall declare him unclean; he shall not confine him, because he is unclean.

content: 12 And if the infectious skin disease breaks out all over on the skin and the infectious skin disease covers all of the afflicted person’s skin from his head to his feet, so far as the priest can see,
content_old: 12 And if the infectious skin disease breaks out all over on the skin and the infectious skin disease covers all of the afflicted person’s skin from his head to his feet, so far as the priest can see,

content: 13 then the priest shall examine it, and if the infectious skin disease covers his whole body, then he shall pronounce the afflicted person clean—all of it has turned white; he is clean.
content_old: 13 then the priest shall examine it, and if the infectious skin disease covers his whole body, then he shall pronounce the afflicted person clean—all of it has turned white; he is clean.

content: 14 But whenever raw flesh appears on him, he shall become unclean.
content_old: 14 But whenever raw flesh appears on him, he shall become unclean.

content: 15 And the priest shall examine the raw flesh, and he shall pronounce him unclean—the raw flesh is unclean; it is an infectious skin disease.
content_old: 15 And the priest shall examine the raw flesh, and he shall pronounce him unclean—the raw flesh is unclean; it is an infectious skin disease.

content: 16 Or, when the raw flesh returns and it has changed to white, then he shall come to the priest,
content_old: 16 Or, when the raw flesh returns and it has changed to white, then he shall come to the priest,

content: 17 and the priest shall examine him, and if the infection has changed to white, then the priest shall pronounce the afflicted person clean—he is clean.
content_old: 17 and the priest shall examine him, and if the infection has changed to white, then the priest shall pronounce the afflicted person clean—he is clean.

content_old: 18 “And when someone’s body has a skin sore on his skin and it is healed

content: 20 And the priest shall examine it, and if its appearance is deeper than the skin and its hair has changed to white, then the priest shall declare him unclean—it is an infectious skin disease; it has broken out in the skin sore.
content_old: 20 And the priest shall examine it, and if its appearance is deeper than the skin and its hair has changed to white, then the priest shall declare him unclean—it is an infectious skin disease; it has broken out in the skin sore.

content_old: 21 And if the priest examines it and if there is no white hair in it and it is not deeper than the skin and it is faded, then the priest shall confine him for seven days.

content: 23 But if the spot has stayed unchanged, it has not spread, it is the skin sore’s scar, so the priest shall declare him clean.
content_old: 23 But if the spot has stayed unchanged, it has not spread, it is the skin sore’s scar, so the priest shall declare him clean.

content_old: 30 then the priest shall examine the infection, and if its appearance is deeper than the skin and in it is thin bright red hair, then the priest shall declare it unclean—it is a diseased area of skin; it is an infectious skin disease of the head or the beard.

content: 31 But if the priest examines the diseased area of the skin’s infection and if its appearance is not deeper than the skin and there is no black hair in it, then the priest shall confine the afflicted person with the diseased area of skin for seven days.

content: 34 And the priest shall examine the diseased area of skin on the seventh day, and if the diseased area has not spread on the skin and its appearance is not deeper than the skin, then the priest shall pronounce him clean, and he shall wash his garments, and he shall be clean.

content_old: 46 For all the days during which the infection is on him, he shall be unclean; he must live alone; his dwelling must be outside the camp.”

content: 8 Then the one who presents himself for cleansing shall wash his garments, and he shall shave off all his hair, and he shall wash himself in the water; thus he shall be clean, and afterward he shall enter the camp, but he shall stay outside his tent for seven days.

content: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying,
content_old: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying,

content: 2 “Speak to the Israelites, and you shall say to them, ‘Any man when a fluid discharge occurs from his body, his fluid discharge is unclean.
content_old: 2 “Speak to the Israelites, and you shall say to them, ‘Any man when a fluid discharge occurs from his body, his fluid discharge is unclean.

content: 3 And this becomes his uncleanness in his fluid discharge: whether his body secretes his fluid discharge or his body blocks his fluid discharge, it is his uncleanness.
content_old: 3 And this becomes his uncleanness in his fluid discharge: whether his body secretes his fluid discharge or his body blocks his fluid discharge, it is his uncleanness.

content: 4 Any bed upon which the person who discharges lies down becomes unclean, and any object upon which he sits becomes unclean.
content_old: 4 Any bed upon which the person who discharges lies down becomes unclean, and any object upon which he sits becomes unclean.

content: 5 And anyone who touches his bed must wash his garments and shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until evening.
content_old: 5 And anyone who touches his bed must wash his garments and shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until evening.

content: 6 And the person who sits on the object upon which the person who discharges has sat must wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.
content_old: 6 And the person who sits on the object upon which the person who discharges has sat must wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.

content: 7 And the person who touches the body of the person who discharges must wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.
content_old: 7 And the person who touches the body of the person who discharges must wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.

content: 8 And if the person who discharges spits on one who is clean, then that one shall wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.
content_old: 8 And if the person who discharges spits on one who is clean, then that one shall wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.

content: 9 And any saddle upon which the person who discharges rides becomes unclean.
content_old: 9 And any saddle upon which the person who discharges rides becomes unclean.

content: 10 And any person who touches anything that happened to be under him becomes unclean until the evening, and the person who carries them must wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.
content_old: 10 And any person who touches anything that happened to be under him becomes unclean until the evening, and the person who carries them must wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.

content: 11 And anyone whom the person who discharges might touch without rinsing off his hands with water shall wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.
content_old: 11 And anyone whom the person who discharges might touch without rinsing off his hands with water shall wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.

content: 12 But a clay vessel that the person who discharges touches must be broken, and any wood object must be rinsed with water.
content_old: 12 But a clay vessel that the person who discharges touches must be broken, and any wood object must be rinsed with water.

content: 13 “ ‘And when the person who discharges becomes clean from his body fluid discharge, he shall count for himself seven days for his cleansing; then he shall wash his garments, and he shall wash his body with fresh water, and he shall be clean.
content_old: 13 “ ‘And when the person who discharges becomes clean from his body fluid discharge, he shall count for himself seven days for his cleansing; then he shall wash his garments, and he shall wash his body with fresh water, and he shall be clean.

content: 14 Then on the eighth day he shall take for himself two turtledoves or two young doves, and he shall come before Yahweh at the tent of assembly’s entrance, and he shall give them to the priest.
content_old: 14 Then on the eighth day he shall take for himself two turtledoves or two young doves, and he shall come before Yahweh at the tent of assembly’s entrance, and he shall give them to the priest.

content: 15 And the priest shall sacrifice one as a sin offering and the other as a burnt offering, and so the priest shall make atonement for him before Yahweh from his body fluid discharge.
content_old: 15 And the priest shall sacrifice one as a sin offering and the other as a burnt offering, and so the priest shall make atonement for him before Yahweh from his body fluid discharge.

content: 16 “ ‘And if an emission of semen goes out from anyone, then he shall wash all of his body with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.
content_old: 16 “ ‘And if an emission of semen goes out from anyone, then he shall wash all of his body with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.

content: 17 And any garment and anything leather on which is an emission of semen shall be washed with water, and it shall be unclean until the evening.
content_old: 17 And any garment and anything leather on which is an emission of semen shall be washed with water, and it shall be unclean until the evening.

content: 18 If there is a woman with whom a man lies down and there is an emission of semen, then they shall wash themselves with water, and they shall be unclean until the evening.
content_old: 18 If there is a woman with whom a man lies down and there is an emission of semen, then they shall wash themselves with water, and they shall be unclean until the evening.

content: 19 “ ‘And when a woman is menstruating, her body fluid discharge occurs in her body; for seven days she shall be in her menstruation, and any person who touches her shall become unclean until the evening.
content_old: 19 “ ‘And when a woman is menstruating, her body fluid discharge occurs in her body; for seven days she shall be in her menstruation, and any person who touches her shall become unclean until the evening.

content: 20 And anything upon which she lies down during her menstruation shall become unclean, and anything upon which she sits shall become unclean.
content_old: 20 And anything upon which she lies down during her menstruation shall become unclean, and anything upon which she sits shall become unclean.

content: 21 And any person who touches her bed must wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.

content: 22 And any person who touches any object on which she sat must wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.
content_old: 22 And any person who touches any object on which she sat must wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening.

content: 23 And if it is on the bed or on the object on which she sits, at his touching it he becomes unclean until the evening.

content_old: 24 And if a man indeed lies with her and her menstruation occurs on him, then he shall be unclean for seven days, and any bed on which he lies down becomes unclean.

content: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses after the death of Aaron’s two sons, when they had come near before Yahweh and they died.

content_old: 2 And Yahweh said to Moses, “Tell your brother Aaron that he should not enter at any time into the sanctuary behind the curtain in front of the atonement cover that is on the ark, so that he might not die, because I appear in the cloud over the atonement cover.

content: 3 “Aaron must enter the sanctuary with this: a young bull as a sin offering and a ram as a burnt offering.
content_old: 3 “Aaron must enter the sanctuary with this: a young bull as a sin offering and a ram as a burnt offering.

content: 4 He must put on a holy linen tunic, and linen undergarments must be on his body, and he must fasten himself with a linen sash, and he must wrap a linen turban around his head—they are holy garments, and he shall wash his body with water, then he shall put them on.
content_old: 4 He must put on a holy linen tunic, and linen undergarments must be on his body, and he must fasten himself with a linen sash, and he must wrap a linen turban around his head—they are holy garments, and he shall wash his body with water, then he shall put them on.

content: 5 And he must take from the Israelites’ community two he-goats as a sin offering and one ram as a burnt offering.
content_old: 5 And he must take from the Israelites’ community two he-goats as a sin offering and one ram as a burnt offering.

content: 6 “And Aaron shall present the sin offering��s bull, which is for himself, and so he shall make atonement for himself and for his family.

content: 7 And he shall take the two goats, and he shall present them before Yahweh at the tent of assembly’s entrance.

content: 8 Then Aaron shall cast lots for the two goats: one lot for Yahweh and one for Azazel.
content_old: 8 Then Aaron shall cast lots for the two goats: one lot for Yahweh and one for Azazel.

content: 9 And Aaron shall present the goat on which the lot for Yahweh fell, and he shall sacrifice it as a sin offering.

content: 10 But he must present alive before Yahweh the goat on which the lot for Azazel fell to make atonement for himself, to send it away into the desert to Azazel.
content_old: 10 But he must present alive before Yahweh the goat on which the lot for Azazel fell to make atonement for himself, to send it away into the desert to Azazel.

content: 13 and he shall put the incense on the fire before Yahweh so that the cloud of incense might cover the atonement cover, which is on the covenant text, so that he might not die.

content: 14 And he shall take some of the bull’s blood, and he shall spatter it with his finger on the atonement cover’s surface on the eastern side, and before the atonement cover he shall spatter some of the blood with his finger seven times.
content_old: 14 And he shall take some of the bull’s blood, and he shall spatter it with his finger on the atonement cover’s surface on the eastern side, and before the atonement cover he shall spatter some of the blood with his finger seven times.

content: 15 “And he shall slaughter the sin offering’s goat, which is for the people, and he shall bring its blood from behind the curtain, and he shall do with its blood as that which he did with the bull’s blood, and he shall spatter it on the atonement cover and before the atonement cover.
content_old: 15 “And he shall slaughter the sin offering’s goat, which is for the people, and he shall bring its blood from behind the curtain, and he shall do with its blood as that which he did with the bull’s blood, and he shall spatter it on the atonement cover and before the atonement cover.

content: 16 Thus he shall make atonement for the sanctuary from the Israelites’ impurities and from their transgressions for all their sins; and so he must do for the tent of assembly, which dwells with them in the midst of their impurities.
content_old: 16 Thus he shall make atonement for the sanctuary from the Israelites’ impurities and from their transgressions for all their sins; and so he must do for the tent of assembly, which dwells with them in the midst of their impurities.

content: 17 And no person shall be in the tent of assembly when he enters to make atonement in the sanctuary until he comes out, and so he shall make atonement for himself and for his family and for all of Israel’s assembly.

content: 18 “Then he shall go out to the altar that is before Yahweh, and he shall make atonement for it; and he shall take some of the bull’s blood and some of the goat’s blood, and he shall put it all around on the altar’s horns.

content: 19 And he shall spatter some of the blood on it seven times with his finger, and he shall cleanse it and consecrate it from the Israelites’ impurities.

content: 20 “And he shall finish making atonement for the sanctuary and the tent of assembly and the altar; then he shall present the living goat.

content: 21 And Aaron shall place his two hands on the living goat’s head, and he shall confess over it all the Israelites’ iniquities and all their transgressions for all their sins, and he shall put them on the goat’s head, and he shall send it away into the desert with a man standing ready.
content_old: 21 And Aaron shall place his two hands on the living goat’s head, and he shall confess over it all the Israelites’ iniquities and all their transgressions for all their sins, and he shall put them on the goat’s head, and he shall send it away into the desert with a man standing ready.

content: 31 It is a Sabbath of complete rest for you, and you shall deny yourselves—it is a lasting statute.

content: 32 And the priest who is anointed and who is ordained to serve as a priest in place of his father shall make atonement; thus he shall put on the linen garments, the holy garments,

content_old: 4 and he does not bring it to the tent of assembly’s entrance to present an offering to Yahweh before Yahweh’s tabernacle, then that man shall be accounted bloodguilty—he has poured out blood, and that man shall be cut off from the midst of his people.

content: 5 This is so that the Israelites may bring their sacrifices that they are sacrificing in the open field and bring them for Yahweh to the tent of assembly’s entrance to the priest, and they shall sacrifice fellowship offerings for Yahweh with them.
content_old: 5 This is so that the Israelites may bring their sacrifices that they are sacrificing in the open field and bring them for Yahweh to the tent of assembly’s entrance to the priest, and they shall sacrifice fellowship offerings for Yahweh with them.

content: 6 And the priest shall sprinkle the blood on Yahweh’s altar at the tent of assembly’s entrance, and he shall burn the fat as an appeasing fragrance for Yahweh.
content_old: 6 And the priest shall sprinkle the blood on Yahweh’s altar at the tent of assembly’s entrance, and he shall burn the fat as an appeasing fragrance for Yahweh.

content: 7 And they may no longer sacrifice their sacrifices to the goat-idols after which they were prostituting. This is a lasting statute for them throughout their generations.” ’
content_old: 7 And they may no longer sacrifice their sacrifices to the goat-idols after which they were prostituting. This is a lasting statute for them throughout their generations.” ’

content: 8 “And you shall say to them, ‘if there is anyone from the house of Israel or from the alien who dwells in their midst who offers a burnt offering or a sacrifice
content_old: 8 “And you shall say to them, ‘if there is anyone from the house of Israel or from the alien who dwells in their midst who offers a burnt offering or a sacrifice

content: 9 and he does not bring it to the tent of assembly’s entrance to sacrifice it for Yahweh, then that man shall be cut off from his people.
content_old: 9 and he does not bring it to the tent of assembly’s entrance to sacrifice it for Yahweh, then that man shall be cut off from his people.

content: 10 And if there is anyone from the house of Israel or from the alien who is dwelling in their midst who eats any blood, then I will set my face against the person who eats the blood, and I will cut him off from among his people.
content_old: 10 And if there is anyone from the house of Israel or from the alien who is dwelling in their midst who eats any blood, then I will set my face against the person who eats the blood, and I will cut him off from among his people.

content: 11 Indeed the flesh’s life is in the blood, and I have given it to you on the altar to make atonement for your lives, because it is the blood with the life that makes atonement.
content_old: 11 Indeed the flesh’s life is in the blood, and I have given it to you on the altar to make atonement for your lives, because it is the blood with the life that makes atonement.

content: 12 Therefore I said to the Israelites, ‘None of you may eat blood, nor may the alien who is dwelling in your midst eat blood.’
content_old: 12 Therefore I said to the Israelites, ‘None of you may eat blood, nor may the alien who is dwelling in your midst eat blood.’

content: 13 “And if there is anyone from the Israelites or from the alien who is dwelling in their midst who hunts a wild game animal or a bird that may be eaten, then he shall pour out its blood, and he shall cover it with the soil.
content_old: 13 “And if there is anyone from the Israelites or from the alien who is dwelling in their midst who hunts a wild game animal or a bird that may be eaten, then he shall pour out its blood, and he shall cover it with the soil.

content: 14 Indeed, the life of all flesh, its blood, is in its life, so I said to the Israelites, ‘You may not eat the blood of any flesh, because the life of all flesh is its blood; anyone who eats it must be cut off.’
content_old: 14 Indeed, the life of all flesh, its blood, is in its life, so I said to the Israelites, ‘You may not eat the blood of any flesh, because the life of all flesh is its blood; anyone who eats it must be cut off.’

content: 15 “And if there is any person who eats a dead body or a mangled carcass, whether among the native or among the alien, then he shall wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening, and he shall be clean.
content_old: 15 “And if there is any person who eats a dead body or a mangled carcass, whether among the native or among the alien, then he shall wash his garments, and he shall wash himself with water, and he shall be unclean until the evening, and he shall be clean.

content: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,
content_old: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

content: 2 “Speak to the Israelites, and say to them, ‘I am Yahweh your God.
content_old: 2 “Speak to the Israelites, and say to them, ‘I am Yahweh your God.

content: 3 You must not carry out the practices of the land of Egypt, in which you lived, and you must not carry out the practices of the land of Canaan, to which I am bringing you; and you must not follow their statutes.
content_old: 3 You must not carry out the practices of the land of Egypt, in which you lived, and you must not carry out the practices of the land of Canaan, to which I am bringing you; and you must not follow their statutes.

content: 4 You must carry out my regulations, and you must observe my statutes by following them; I am Yahweh your God.
content_old: 4 You must carry out my regulations, and you must observe my statutes by following them; I am Yahweh your God.

content: 5 And you shall observe my statutes and my regulations by which the person doing them shall live; I am Yahweh.
content_old: 5 And you shall observe my statutes and my regulations by which the person doing them shall live; I am Yahweh.

content: 6 “ ‘None of you shall approach anyone who is his close relative to expose nakedness; I am Yahweh.
content_old: 6 “ ‘None of you shall approach anyone who is his close relative to expose nakedness; I am Yahweh.

content: 7 You must not expose your father’s nakedness or your mother’s nakedness—she is your mother; you must not expose her nakedness.
content_old: 7 You must not expose your father’s nakedness or your mother’s nakedness—she is your mother; you must not expose her nakedness.

content: 8 You must not expose the nakedness of your father’s wife—it is your father’s nakedness.
content_old: 8 You must not expose the nakedness of your father’s wife—it is your father’s nakedness.

content: 9 As for your sister’s nakedness, whether your father’s daughter or your mother’s daughter, whether born at home or born abroad, you must not expose their nakedness.
content_old: 9 As for your sister’s nakedness, whether your father’s daughter or your mother’s daughter, whether born at home or born abroad, you must not expose their nakedness.

content: 10 As for the nakedness of your son’s daughter or your daughter’s daughter, you must not expose their nakedness, because they are your nakedness.
content_old: 10 As for the nakedness of your son’s daughter or your daughter’s daughter, you must not expose their nakedness, because they are your nakedness.

content: 11 As for the nakedness of the daughter of your father’s wife, she is your sister, a relative of your father; you must not expose her nakedness.
content_old: 11 As for the nakedness of the daughter of your father’s wife, she is your sister, a relative of your father; you must not expose her nakedness.

content: 12 You must not expose the nakedness of your father’s sister; she is your father’s close relative.
content_old: 12 You must not expose the nakedness of your father’s sister; she is your father’s close relative.

content: 13 You must not expose the nakedness of your mother’s sister, because she is your mother’s close relative.
content_old: 13 You must not expose the nakedness of your mother’s sister, because she is your mother’s close relative.

content: 14 You must not expose the nakedness of your father’s brother; you must not have sex with his wife—she is your aunt.
content_old: 14 You must not expose the nakedness of your father’s brother; you must not have sex with his wife—she is your aunt.

content: 15 You must not expose your daughter-in-law’s nakedness; she is your son’s wife; you must not expose her nakedness.
content_old: 15 You must not expose your daughter-in-law’s nakedness; she is your son’s wife; you must not expose her nakedness.

content: 16 You must not expose the nakedness of your brother’s wife; she is your brother’s nakedness.
content_old: 16 You must not expose the nakedness of your brother’s wife; she is your brother’s nakedness.

content: 17 You must not expose the nakedness of a woman and her daughter, or her son’s daughter, or her daughter’s daughter; you must not take her as wife to expose her nakedness; they are close relatives—that is wickedness.
content_old: 17 You must not expose the nakedness of a woman and her daughter, or her son’s daughter, or her daughter’s daughter; you must not take her as wife to expose her nakedness; they are close relatives—that is wickedness.

content: 18 And you must not take as wife a woman with her sister, to be a rival-wife, to expose her nakedness before her during her life.
content_old: 18 And you must not take as wife a woman with her sister, to be a rival-wife, to expose her nakedness before her during her life.

content: 19 “ ‘And you must not have sex with a woman to expose her nakedness during her menstrual uncleanness.
content_old: 19 “ ‘And you must not have sex with a woman to expose her nakedness during her menstrual uncleanness.

content: 20 And you must not have sex with your fellow citizen’s wife, becoming unclean with her.
content_old: 20 And you must not have sex with your fellow citizen’s wife, becoming unclean with her.

content: 21 “ ‘And you shall not give any of your offspring in order to sacrifice them to Molech, nor shall you profane the name of your God; I am Yahweh.
content_old: 21 “ ‘And you shall not give any of your offspring in order to sacrifice them to Molech, nor shall you profane the name of your God; I am Yahweh.

content: 22 And you shall not lie with a male as lying with a woman; that is a detestable thing.
content_old: 22 And you shall not lie with a male as lying with a woman; that is a detestable thing.

content: 23 And you shall not have sexual relations with any animal, becoming unclean with it; and a woman shall not stand before an animal to copulate with it—that is a perversion.
content_old: 23 And you shall not have sexual relations with any animal, becoming unclean with it; and a woman shall not stand before an animal to copulate with it—that is a perversion.

content: 24 “ ‘You must not make yourself unclean in any of these things, because the nations whom I am driving out from your presence were made unclean by all of these.
content_old: 24 “ ‘You must not make yourself unclean in any of these things, because the nations whom I am driving out from your presence were made unclean by all of these.

content: 25 So the land became unclean, and I have brought the punishment of its guilt upon it, and the land has vomited out its inhabitants.
content_old: 25 So the land became unclean, and I have brought the punishment of its guilt upon it, and the land has vomited out its inhabitants.

content: 26 But you (neither the native nor the alien who is dwelling in your midst) shall keep my statutes and my regulations, and you shall not practice any of these detestable things
content_old: 26 But you (neither the native nor the alien who is dwelling in your midst) shall keep my statutes and my regulations, and you shall not practice any of these detestable things

content: 27 (because the people of the land, who were before you, did all these detestable things, so the land became unclean),
content_old: 27 (because the people of the land, who were before you, did all these detestable things, so the land became unclean),

content: 28 so that the land will not vomit you out when you make it unclean just as it vomited out the nation that was before you.
content_old: 28 so that the land will not vomit you out when you make it unclean just as it vomited out the nation that was before you.

content: 29 Indeed, anyone who does any of these detestable things, even those persons who do so shall be cut off from the midst of their people.
content_old: 29 Indeed, anyone who does any of these detestable things, even those persons who do so shall be cut off from the midst of their people.

content: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,
content_old: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

content: 2 “Speak to all the community of the Israelites, and say to them, ‘You must be holy, because I, Yahweh your God, am holy.
content_old: 2 “Speak to all the community of the Israelites, and say to them, ‘You must be holy, because I, Yahweh your God, am holy.

content: 3 Each of you must revere your mother and your father, and you must keep my Sabbaths; I am Yahweh your God.
content_old: 3 Each of you must revere your mother and your father, and you must keep my Sabbaths; I am Yahweh your God.

content: 4 You must not turn to idols, and you must not make for yourselves gods of cast metal; I am Yahweh your God.
content_old: 4 You must not turn to idols, and you must not make for yourselves gods of cast metal; I am Yahweh your God.

content: 5 “ ‘And when you sacrifice a sacrifice of fellowship offerings to Yahweh, you must sacrifice it for your acceptance.
content_old: 5 “ ‘And when you sacrifice a sacrifice of fellowship offerings to Yahweh, you must sacrifice it for your acceptance.

content: 6 It must be eaten on the day of your sacrifice and the next day; but the remainder must be burned up in the fire by the third day.
content_old: 6 It must be eaten on the day of your sacrifice and the next day; but the remainder must be burned up in the fire by the third day.

content: 7 And if it is indeed eaten on the third day, it is unclean meat; it shall not be regarded as accepted.
content_old: 7 And if it is indeed eaten on the third day, it is unclean meat; it shall not be regarded as accepted.

content: 8 And the one who eats it shall bear his guilt, because he has profaned Yahweh’s holiness, and that person shall be cut off from his people.
content_old: 8 And the one who eats it shall bear his guilt, because he has profaned Yahweh’s holiness, and that person shall be cut off from his people.

content: 9 “ ‘And at your reaping the harvest of your land you must not finish reaping the edge of your field, and you must not glean the remnants of your harvest.
content_old: 9 “ ‘And at your reaping the harvest of your land you must not finish reaping the edge of your field, and you must not glean the remnants of your harvest.

content: 10 And you must not glean your vineyard, and you must not gather your vineyard’s fallen grapes; you must leave them behind for the needy and for the alien; I am Yahweh your God.
content_old: 10 And you must not glean your vineyard, and you must not gather your vineyard’s fallen grapes; you must leave them behind for the needy and for the alien; I am Yahweh your God.

content: 11 “ ‘You shall not steal, and you shall not deceive, and you shall not lie to one another;
content_old: 11 “ ‘You shall not steal, and you shall not deceive, and you shall not lie to one another;

content: 12 and you shall not swear falsely in my name, and so one of you profane the name of your God; I am Yahweh.
content_old: 12 and you shall not swear falsely in my name, and so one of you profane the name of your God; I am Yahweh.

content: 13 “ ‘You shall not exploit your neighbor, and you shall not rob him; a hired worker’s wage you shall not withhold overnight until morning.
content_old: 13 “ ‘You shall not exploit your neighbor, and you shall not rob him; a hired worker’s wage you shall not withhold overnight until morning.

content: 14 You shall not curse the deaf, and you shall not put a stumbling block before a blind person, but you shall revere your God; I am Yahweh.
content_old: 14 You shall not curse the deaf, and you shall not put a stumbling block before a blind person, but you shall revere your God; I am Yahweh.

content: 15 “ ‘You shall not do injustice in judgment; you shall not show partiality to the powerless; you shall not give preference to the powerful; you shall judge your fellow citizen with justice.
content_old: 15 “ ‘You shall not do injustice in judgment; you shall not show partiality to the powerless; you shall not give preference to the powerful; you shall judge your fellow citizen with justice.

content: 16 You shall not go about with slander among your people; you shall not endanger your neighbor’s life; I am Yahweh.
content_old: 16 You shall not go about with slander among your people; you shall not endanger your neighbor’s life; I am Yahweh.

content: 17 “ ‘You shall not hate your brother in your heart; you shall surely rebuke your fellow citizen, so that you do not incur sin along with him.
content_old: 17 “ ‘You shall not hate your brother in your heart; you shall surely rebuke your fellow citizen, so that you do not incur sin along with him.

content: 18 You shall not seek vengeance, and you shall not harbor a grudge against your fellow citizens; and you shall love your neighbor like yourself; I am Yahweh.
content_old: 18 You shall not seek vengeance, and you shall not harbor a grudge against your fellow citizens; and you shall love your neighbor like yourself; I am Yahweh.

content: 19 “ ‘You must keep my statutes: as for your domestic animals, you shall not cause two differing kinds to breed; as for your field, you shall not sow two differing kinds of seed; and, a garment of two differing kinds of woven material should not be worn on you.
content_old: 19 “ ‘You must keep my statutes: as for your domestic animals, you shall not cause two differing kinds to breed; as for your field, you shall not sow two differing kinds of seed; and, a garment of two differing kinds of woven material should not be worn on you.

content: 20 “ ‘And when a man lies with a woman and there is an emission of semen and she is a female slave promised to a man, but she indeed has not been ransomed or freedom has not been given to her, there shall be an obligation to compensate; they shall not be put to death, because she has not been freed.
content_old: 20 “ ‘And when a man lies with a woman and there is an emission of semen and she is a female slave promised to a man, but she indeed has not been ransomed or freedom has not been given to her, there shall be an obligation to compensate; they shall not be put to death, because she has not been freed.

content: 21 And he shall bring his guilt offering to Yahweh at the tent of assembly’s entrance: a ram for a guilt offering.
content_old: 21 And he shall bring his guilt offering to Yahweh at the tent of assembly’s entrance: a ram for a guilt offering.

content: 22 And the priest shall make atonement for him before Yahweh with the ram of the guilt offering for his sin that he committed, and so his sin that he committed shall be forgiven him.
content_old: 22 And the priest shall make atonement for him before Yahweh with the ram of the guilt offering for his sin that he committed, and so his sin that he committed shall be forgiven him.

content: 23 “ ‘And when you have come into the land and you plant any tree for food, you shall regard its fruit as unharvestable; for three years it shall be forbidden for you; it shall not be eaten.
content_old: 23 “ ‘And when you have come into the land and you plant any tree for food, you shall regard its fruit as unharvestable; for three years it shall be forbidden for you; it shall not be eaten.

content: 24 But in the fourth year all its fruit shall be holy, offerings of praise for Yahweh.
content_old: 24 But in the fourth year all its fruit shall be holy, offerings of praise for Yahweh.

content: 25 And in the fifth year you shall eat its fruit to increase its yield for you; I am Yahweh your God.
content_old: 25 And in the fifth year you shall eat its fruit to increase its yield for you; I am Yahweh your God.

content: 26 “ ‘You must not eat anything with the blood; you shall not practice divination, nor shall you interpret signs.
content_old: 26 “ ‘You must not eat anything with the blood; you shall not practice divination, nor shall you interpret signs.

content: 27 You shall not round off the corner hair of your head, and you shall not trim the corner of your beard.
content_old: 27 You shall not round off the corner hair of your head, and you shall not trim the corner of your beard.

content: 28 And you shall not make a slash in your body for a dead person, nor shall you make on yourselves a tattoo’s mark; I am Yahweh.
content_old: 28 And you shall not make a slash in your body for a dead person, nor shall you make on yourselves a tattoo’s mark; I am Yahweh.

content: 29 “ ‘You shall not profane your daughter by making her a prostitute, lest the land be prostituted and the land fill up with depravity.
content_old: 29 “ ‘You shall not profane your daughter by making her a prostitute, lest the land be prostituted and the land fill up with depravity.

content: 30 You shall keep my Sabbaths, and you shall revere my sanctuary; I am Yahweh.
content_old: 30 You shall keep my Sabbaths, and you shall revere my sanctuary; I am Yahweh.

content: 31 “ ‘You shall not turn to the mediums and to the soothsayers; you shall not seek them to become unclean with them; I am Yahweh your God.
content_old: 31 “ ‘You shall not turn to the mediums and to the soothsayers; you shall not seek them to become unclean with them; I am Yahweh your God.

content: 32 “ ‘Before old age you shall get up, and you shall show respect for an old person; and you shall revere your God; I am Yahweh.
content_old: 32 “ ‘Before old age you shall get up, and you shall show respect for an old person; and you shall revere your God; I am Yahweh.

content: 33 “ ‘And when an alien dwells with you in your land, you shall not oppress him.
content_old: 33 “ ‘And when an alien dwells with you in your land, you shall not oppress him.

content: 34 The alien who is dwelling with you shall be like a native among you, and you shall love him like yourself, because you were aliens in the land of Egypt; I am Yahweh your God.
content_old: 34 The alien who is dwelling with you shall be like a native among you, and you shall love him like yourself, because you were aliens in the land of Egypt; I am Yahweh your God.

content: 35 “ ‘You shall not commit injustice in regulation, in measurement, in weight, or volume.
content_old: 35 “ ‘You shall not commit injustice in regulation, in measurement, in weight, or volume.

content: 36 You must have honest balances, honest weights, an honest ephah, and an honest hin; I am Yahweh your God who brought you out from the land of Egypt.
content_old: 36 You must have honest balances, honest weights, an honest ephah, and an honest hin; I am Yahweh your God who brought you out from the land of Egypt.

content: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,
content_old: 1 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

content: 2 “And to the Israelites you shall say, ‘If there is anyone from the Israelites or from the alien who is dwelling in Israel, who gives any of his offspring to Molech, he must surely be put to death; the people of the land must stone him with stones.
content_old: 2 “And to the Israelites you shall say, ‘If there is anyone from the Israelites or from the alien who is dwelling in Israel, who gives any of his offspring to Molech, he must surely be put to death; the people of the land must stone him with stones.

content: 3 And I myself will set my face against that man, and I will cut him off from the midst of his people, because he has given some of his offspring to Molech, so that he makes my sanctuary unclean and profanes my holy name.
content_old: 3 And I myself will set my face against that man, and I will cut him off from the midst of his people, because he has given some of his offspring to Molech, so that he makes my sanctuary unclean and profanes my holy name.

content: 4 And if the people of the land ever shut their eyes from that man at his giving some of his offspring to Molech, not putting him to death,
content_old: 4 And if the people of the land ever shut their eyes from that man at his giving some of his offspring to Molech, not putting him to death,

content: 5 then I myself will set my face against that man and against his clan, and I will cut him off and all those from the midst of their people who prostitute after Molech.
content_old: 5 then I myself will set my face against that man and against his clan, and I will cut him off and all those from the midst of their people who prostitute after Molech.

content: 6 As for the person who turns to the mediums and the soothsayers to prostitute after them, I will set my face against that person, and I will cut him off from the midst of his people.
content_old: 6 As for the person who turns to the mediums and the soothsayers to prostitute after them, I will set my face against that person, and I will cut him off from the midst of his people.

content: 7 “ ‘And you shall consecrate yourselves, and you shall be holy, because I am Yahweh your God.
content_old: 7 “ ‘And you shall consecrate yourselves, and you shall be holy, because I am Yahweh your God.

content: 8 And you shall keep my statutes, and you shall do them; I am Yahweh who consecrates you.
content_old: 8 And you shall keep my statutes, and you shall do them; I am Yahweh who consecrates you.

content: 9 “ ‘If there is anyone who curses his father or his mother, he shall surely be put to death; he has cursed his father and his mother—his blood is upon him.
content_old: 9 “ ‘If there is anyone who curses his father or his mother, he shall surely be put to death; he has cursed his father and his mother—his blood is upon him.

content: 10 “ ‘As for a man who commits adultery with a man’s wife, who commits adultery with his neighbor’s wife, both the man who commits adultery and the woman who commits adultery shall surely be put to death.
content_old: 10 “ ‘As for a man who commits adultery with a man’s wife, who commits adultery with his neighbor’s wife, both the man who commits adultery and the woman who commits adultery shall surely be put to death.

content: 11 As for a man who lies with his father’s wife, he has exposed his father’s nakedness; both of them shall be put to death—their blood is on them.
content_old: 11 As for a man who lies with his father’s wife, he has exposed his father’s nakedness; both of them shall be put to death—their blood is on them.

content: 12 As for a man who lies with his daughter-in-law, both of them shall be put to death; they have committed a perversion—their blood is on them.
content_old: 12 As for a man who lies with his daughter-in-law, both of them shall be put to death; they have committed a perversion—their blood is on them.

content: 13 “ ‘As for the man who lies with a male as lying with a woman, they have committed a detestable thing; they shall surely be put to death—their blood is on them.
content_old: 13 “ ‘As for the man who lies with a male as lying with a woman, they have committed a detestable thing; they shall surely be put to death—their blood is on them.

content: 14 “ ‘As for a man who marries a woman and her mother, that is depravity; they shall burn him and them, so that it shall not become depravity in the midst of you all.
content_old: 14 “ ‘As for a man who marries a woman and her mother, that is depravity; they shall burn him and them, so that it shall not become depravity in the midst of you all.

content: 15 “ ‘As for a man who has sexual relations with an animal, he shall surely be put to death, and you must kill the animal.
content_old: 15 “ ‘As for a man who has sexual relations with an animal, he shall surely be put to death, and you must kill the animal.

content: 16 As for a woman who approaches any animal to copulate with it, you shall kill the woman and the animal; they shall surely be put to death—their blood is on them.
content_old: 16 As for a woman who approaches any animal to copulate with it, you shall kill the woman and the animal; they shall surely be put to death—their blood is on them.

content: 17 “ ‘As for a man who takes his sister, his father’s daughter or his mother’s daughter, and he sees her nakedness and she herself sees his nakedness, it is a disgrace, and they shall be cut off before the eyes of their people; he has exposed his sister’s nakedness—he must bear his guilt.
content_old: 17 “ ‘As for a man who takes his sister, his father’s daughter or his mother’s daughter, and he sees her nakedness and she herself sees his nakedness, it is a disgrace, and they shall be cut off before the eyes of their people; he has exposed his sister’s nakedness—he must bear his guilt.

content: 18 As for a man who lies with a menstruating woman, he exposes her nakedness—her source he exposes and she herself reveals her blood’s source—both of them shall be cut off from the midst of their people.
content_old: 18 As for a man who lies with a menstruating woman, he exposes her nakedness—her source he exposes and she herself reveals her blood’s source—both of them shall be cut off from the midst of their people.

content: 19 And you shall not expose the nakedness of your mother’s sister, and you shall not expose your father’s sister, because such a person has dishonored his close relative—they must bear their guilt.
content_old: 19 And you shall not expose the nakedness of your mother’s sister, and you shall not expose your father’s sister, because such a person has dishonored his close relative—they must bear their guilt.

content: 20 As for a man who lies with his aunt, he has exposed his uncle’s nakedness—they shall bear their sin; they shall die childless.
content_old: 20 As for a man who lies with his aunt, he has exposed his uncle’s nakedness—they shall bear their sin; they shall die childless.

content: 21 As for a man who marries his brother’s wife, it is an abomination; he has exposed his brother’s nakedness—they shall be childless.
content_old: 21 As for a man who marries his brother’s wife, it is an abomination; he has exposed his brother’s nakedness—they shall be childless.

content: 22 “ ‘And you shall keep all my statutes and all my regulations, and you shall do them, so that the land, to which I am bringing you to inhabit it, shall not vomit you out.
content_old: 22 “ ‘And you shall keep all my statutes and all my regulations, and you shall do them, so that the land, to which I am bringing you to inhabit it, shall not vomit you out.

content: 23 And you shall not follow the statutes of the nation that I am driving out from before you, because they did all these things, and I detested them.
content_old: 23 And you shall not follow the statutes of the nation that I am driving out from before you, because they did all these things, and I detested them.

content: 24 So I said to you, “You yourselves shall take possession of their land, and I myself shall give it to you to possess it—a land flowing with milk and honey”; I am Yahweh your God, who has set you apart from the nations.
content_old: 24 So I said to you, “You yourselves shall take possession of their land, and I myself shall give it to you to possess it—a land flowing with milk and honey”; I am Yahweh your God, who has set you apart from the nations.

content: 25 And you shall distinguish between the clean and the unclean animal and between the unclean and the clean bird; and you shall not defile yourselves with the animal or with the bird or with anything that moves along the ground that I have set apart for you as unclean.
content_old: 25 And you shall distinguish between the clean and the unclean animal and between the unclean and the clean bird; and you shall not defile yourselves with the animal or with the bird or with anything that moves along the ground that I have set apart for you as unclean.

content: 26 And you shall be holy for me, because I, Yahweh, am holy, and I have singled you out from the nations to be mine.
content_old: 26 And you shall be holy for me, because I, Yahweh, am holy, and I have singled you out from the nations to be mine.

content: 1 Then Yahweh said to Moses, “Speak to the priests, Aaron’s sons, and say to them, ‘One must not make himself unclean for a dead person among his own people,
content_old: 1 Then Yahweh said to Moses, “Speak to the priests, Aaron’s sons, and say to them, ‘One must not make himself unclean for a dead person among his own people,

content: 2 except for his direct relative closest to him: his mother and his father, and his son and his daughter, and his brother,
content_old: 2 except for his direct relative closest to him: his mother and his father, and his son and his daughter, and his brother,

content: 3 and for his sister, a virgin, who is closest to him, who has not had a husband—for her he may defile himself.
content_old: 3 and for his sister, a virgin, who is closest to him, who has not had a husband—for her he may defile himself.

content: 4 He must not make himself unclean as a kinsman by marriage, defiling himself.
content_old: 4 He must not make himself unclean as a kinsman by marriage, defiling himself.

content: 5 “ ‘And they shall not shave bald patches on their head, and they shall not shave off the corner of their beard, and they shall not make a cut in their body.
content_old: 5 “ ‘And they shall not shave bald patches on their head, and they shall not shave off the corner of their beard, and they shall not make a cut in their body.

content: 6 They shall be holy to their God, and they shall not profane the name of their God, because they are bringing near the offerings made by fire to Yahweh—their God’s food—and they shall be holy.
content_old: 6 They shall be holy to their God, and they shall not profane the name of their God, because they are bringing near the offerings made by fire to Yahweh—their God’s food—and they shall be holy.

content: 7 “ ‘They shall not marry a woman who is a prostitute and defiled, nor shall they marry a woman divorced from her husband, because each priest is holy for his God.
content_old: 7 “ ‘They shall not marry a woman who is a prostitute and defiled, nor shall they marry a woman divorced from her husband, because each priest is holy for his God.

content: 8 And you shall consecrate him, because he is bringing near your God’s food; he shall be holy to you, since I, Yahweh, who consecrates you, am holy.
content_old: 8 And you shall consecrate him, because he is bringing near your God’s food; he shall be holy to you, since I, Yahweh, who consecrates you, am holy.

content: 9 “ ‘As for the daughter of any priest, if she is defiled by prostituting, she is disgracing her father—she shall be burned in the fire.
content_old: 9 “ ‘As for the daughter of any priest, if she is defiled by prostituting, she is disgracing her father—she shall be burned in the fire.

content: 10 “ ‘As for the priest who is higher than his brothers, on whose head the oil of anointment is poured and he was ordained to wear the garments, he shall not dishevel his head, and he shall not tear his garments.
content_old: 10 “ ‘As for the priest who is higher than his brothers, on whose head the oil of anointment is poured and he was ordained to wear the garments, he shall not dishevel his head, and he shall not tear his garments.

content: 11 And he shall not go near any dead person, nor shall he make himself unclean for his father or for his mother.
content_old: 11 And he shall not go near any dead person, nor shall he make himself unclean for his father or for his mother.

content: 12 And he shall not go out from the sanctuary, and he shall not profane his God’s sanctuary, because the dedication of his God’s oil of anointment is on him; I am Yahweh.
content_old: 12 And he shall not go out from the sanctuary, and he shall not profane his God’s sanctuary, because the dedication of his God’s oil of anointment is on him; I am Yahweh.

content: 13 “ ‘And he himself must take a wife in her virginity.
content_old: 13 “ ‘And he himself must take a wife in her virginity.

content: 14 A widow or a divorced woman or a defiled woman, a prostitute—these he must not take; he shall take only a virgin from his people as wife.
content_old: 14 A widow or a divorced woman or a defiled woman, a prostitute—these he must not take; he shall take only a virgin from his people as wife.

content: 15 And he shall not profane his offspring among his people, because I am Yahweh, who consecrates him.’ ”
content_old: 15 And he shall not profane his offspring among his people, because I am Yahweh, who consecrates him.’ ”

content: 16 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,
content_old: 16 Then Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

content: 17 “Speak to Aaron, saying, ‘A man from your offspring throughout their generations, in whom is a physical defect, shall not come near to present your God’s food.
content_old: 17 “Speak to Aaron, saying, ‘A man from your offspring throughout their generations, in whom is a physical defect, shall not come near to present your God’s food.

content: 18 Indeed, any man in whom is a physical defect shall not come near: a blind man or lame or disfigured or deformed,
content_old: 18 Indeed, any man in whom is a physical defect shall not come near: a blind man or lame or disfigured or deformed,

content: 19 or a man in whom is a broken foot or a broken hand,
content_old: 19 or a man in whom is a broken foot or a broken hand,
